name: MegaBlasters!
description:
Get ready to laugh and blast through 100 physics-based maps in this comedic multiplayer FPS game. With wacky weapons and fast-paced action, it's a hilarious and explosive experience for you and your friends.



  • Play with 3 other blasters, either friends or random (all wrigglin' around)
  • Chaotic physics based guns
  • 100+ Chaotic physics maps (with destructive maps for destructive people)
  • Quick in-game chat (distract n' kill lol)
  • Who doesn't like blackholes and stuff?
  • Make someone go boom (sus bomb)
  • Noodle limbs (cuz why not)
  • Punch with your noodle hands
